text: His servants Jozabad 12:21 Hebrew; LXX and Syriac Jozacar son of Shimeath and Jehozabad son of Shomer 12:21 Shomer is a variant of Shimrith; see 2 Chronicles 24:26. struck him down, and he died. And they buried him with his fathers in the City of David, and his son Amaziah reigned in his place.
